thread.title: Kibbutzim Look to Future in High-Tech

author: Sara Toth Stub
title: Kibbutzim Look to Future in High-Tech
text:
KIBBUTZ SASA, Israelâ€”For 66 years, this mountaintop collective near the Lebanese border has relied on apples, dairy cows and, more recently, a vehicle-armor factory for its livelihood.
But its fastest-growing business is cybersecurity startup Sasa Software, which makes software that filters and secures data and networks. From a standing start in... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
